data.text:
150-gram vinyl reissue

Plated and pressed at Quality Record Pressings!

2021 Grammy winner for Best Folk Album!

Covering songs by John Prine, Bob Dylan, Norman Blake and more!

"Being analog devotees, you can be sure the recording was to tape and remained in the analog domain through lacquer cutting on the couple's restored lathe now located closer to home in Nashville. ... the production doesn't attempt to produce a studio recording at home. Rather it's a living room recording done right ... You are sure to enjoy both the music making and the sound throughout." â€” Music = 11/11; Sound = 11/11 - Michael Fremer, AnalogPlanet.com. To read Fremer's full review click here.

Originally released as a handmade, limited edition in July 2020. This new edition comes in a redesigned old style tip-on jacket with custom paper and additional photos. The first Gillian Welch / David Rawlings collaboration to feature both of their names, All The Good Times is a collection of 10 acoustic covers recorded at home. Produced by David Rawlings. Named the 2021 Grammy winner for Best Folk Album!

Music

Sound

Ratings from Michael Fremer @ AnalogPlanet.com
